channel.title: Alterin
channel.description:
[center] https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AYA1Q9W5vec Welcome to Alterin, a truley free RSPS. Website [url=http://alterin718.tk]http://alterin718.tk[/url] Download full client [url=https://www.mediafire.com/?ughre7zicyecmii]https://www.mediafire.com/?ughre7zicyecmii[/url]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=5][B] PLAY NOW (Jar file) [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/ughre7zicyecmii/Play_Now_Alterin.jar]Play Now Alterin[/url][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[IMG]http://www.speedtest.net/result/3937745337.png[/img] [spoiler=Want to be a developer?]
Hey there, I am currently in need of developers... I must ask of this only: Basic understanding of Java Add shops, npcs, drops, monsters, basic things like that. Good over-view of the MATRIX system. Reliable, and trust worthy. Will be paid Depending on work that is done. MUST KNOW HOW TO USE ECLIPSE
Will not give out tutorials on how to setup, or use.
Now how does it work, how do we all work together?
Okay, let's say we have a team of 4 people, TEAM A, and TEAM B. Team A will work on a lets say, minigame, whilst team B would be working on the NPCS. It would be things like that.
You have the HOST SERVER, Which is connected to DROPBOX, which we connect to DROPBOX which will then update the server LIVE. Till the HOST SERVER is restarted.
[/spoiler] Forums - [url=http://alterin.site50.net/smf/]Alterin - A true free RSPS - Index[/url] Webclient - [url=http://alterin.site50.net/webclient.html]Alterin[/url] [Must have proper Java secruity settings] Download full client [url=https://www.mediafire.com/?ughre7zicyecmii]https://www.mediafire.com/?ughre7zicyecmii[/url]
PLAY NOW (Jar file) [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/ughre7zicyecmii/Play_Now_Alterin.jar]Play Now Alterin[/url]
[spoiler=Server Info] Server Name: Alterin Creator: Brendan Forums? Yes Webclient? Yes Highscores? No Vote rewards? No Donations? Accectepted Player points? Yes VPS? Yes @ 2GB Uptime? 24/7 [Unless updates] Weekly updates? Every sunday night at 11:30 MOUNTAIN TIME Home: Alterin Combat XP RATE = 50 [NOTE: Will change upon enough requests] Skilling XP RATE = 50 DOUBLE XP? Yes Zombies Enabled? Yes Economy mode? No Basic server info Revision - 718 Donator? = None Date-Created 11/15/2014 Server-Ip Alterin.no-ip.biz - 43594 Mods [ None ] Forum Mods [ None ] [COLOR="#00FFFF"][B][/spoiler] A city in the desert, has been growing larger and larger by the day. Where many adventurers have grown. It is one of the main fast travel places, a city full of shops, and quests. Minigames to play, challanges to discover. Rare items to collect and earn, bosses to fight, FREE. Custom items for players to earn such as, Master Skill Capes, New godswords, new armour, Death Lotus Gear, Ahrims book, and much much more, you don't need to pay for this, or be a donator. You just need to login, and start your free adventure today. Experience, many cool places, lots of bosses to fight, a vast city to explore, hours and hours of endless gameplay. A great economy, based on the players, updates based on the players.
You can over 10 kinds of bosses, earn items not even Administrators can get, go on quests, play from over 5 mini-games. Weekly updates that include, new bosses, new items, new quests, new adventures.
I wanted to create this server, for players to experience what it is like to earn rare items, and fight bosses never before seen. Quests added just for the players, and everything is just for the players. Nobody wants to play a server where you need to donate for custom items, or just to fight bosses!
Server is hosted on a private server, great internet connection. Up to 2GB in Data.
[/B][/COLOR] Free custom items, for every player, that wants to come earn them, and have that feeling of showing off(: It isn't easy, but it is worth it!
[Currently in need of Player-Mods, recquirements = playing for atleast 2 weeks.] [Currently in need of Developers]
[spoiler=Some features]
*Curses *Lunars *Godswords *Specials *Death Lotus Adventure *8 Quests *Ancient Magic *Player Design *KBD *Custom items, armours *Custom Skill capes *Custom party hat *weekly updates *smithing *all skills [/spoiler] Over 40 Pictures [spoiler=pictures] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/18s1bDY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/18s1bDY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/18s1bDY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UErPxhr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Tkk3E0k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1qKOuR0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Kz5pbz9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a319r5S.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tM4xkcQ.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hKk8uDy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FSFihHT.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8Pnt4HA.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/39hTq7N.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VQuPfmn.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jJodqA2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8xcBJxD.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3x5DBxg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/D8RHBl5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WsG6dkg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3pe18qT.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wnalaa4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/73ZG8aR.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NPFZqpf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5Rb7GAc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sxOzPNc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JyxyGQu.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xGQ45ob.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pBHCpTQ.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YKsBj1a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CSvEncg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KH6mIdP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/D3RpubS.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U2hw1Dx.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AOlJC70.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PNUGesb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VuBmIgL.jpg[/img]
[/spoiler] So well what do you think?
Download full client [url=https://www.mediafire.com/?ughre7zicyecmii]https://www.mediafire.com/?ughre7zicyecmii[/url]
PLAY NOW (Jar file) [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/ughre7zicyecmii/Play_Now_Alterin.jar]Play Now Alterin[/url] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/O05AO7g.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Zh8yhMO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mzCCFGp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vwfZJyQ.png[/img]

item.description:
@Alterin_718 wrote:

[center]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AYA1Q9W5vec
Welcome to Alterin, a truley free RSPS.
Website
http://alterin718.tk
Download full client
https://www.mediafire.com/?ughre7zicyecmii

[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=5][B]
PLAY NOW (Jar file)
Play Now Alterin[/B][/SIZE][/FONT]


[spoiler=Want to be a developer?]

Hey there, I am currently in need of developers…
I must ask of this only:
Basic understanding of Java
Add shops, npcs, drops, monsters, basic things like that.
Good over-view of the MATRIX system.
Reliable, and trust worthy.
Will be paid Depending on work that is done.
MUST KNOW HOW TO USE ECLIPSE

Will not give out tutorials on how to setup, or use.

Now how does it work, how do we all work together?

Okay, let’s say we have a team of 4 people, TEAM A, and TEAM B.
Team A will work on a lets say, minigame, whilst team B would be working on
the NPCS.
It would be things like that.

You have the HOST SERVER, Which is connected to DROPBOX, which we connect to DROPBOX which will then update the server LIVE.
Till the HOST SERVER is restarted.

[/spoiler]

[COLOR="#00FFFF"][B][/spoiler]
A city in the desert, has been growing larger and larger by the day. Where many adventurers have grown.
It is one of the main fast travel places, a city full of shops, and quests. Minigames to play, challanges to discover.
Rare items to collect and earn, bosses to fight, FREE. Custom items for players to earn such as, Master Skill Capes,
New godswords, new armour, Death Lotus Gear, Ahrims book, and much much more, you don’t need to pay for this, or be a donator.
You just need to login, and start your free adventure today. Experience, many cool places, lots of bosses to fight, a vast city
to explore, hours and hours of endless gameplay. A great economy, based on the players, updates based on the players.

You can over 10 kinds of bosses, earn items not even Administrators can get, go on quests, play from over 5 mini-games.
Weekly updates that include, new bosses, new items, new quests, new adventures.

I wanted to create this server, for players to experience what it is like to earn rare items, and fight bosses never before
seen. Quests added just for the players, and everything is just for the players. Nobody wants to play a server where you need
to donate for custom items, or just to fight bosses!

Server is hosted on a private server, great internet connection.
Up to 2GB in Data.

[/B][/COLOR]
Free custom items, for every player, that wants to come earn them, and have that feeling of showing off(:
It isn’t easy, but it is worth it!

[Currently in need of Player-Mods, recquirements = playing for atleast 2 weeks.]
[Currently in need of Developers]
